entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Fundy (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:17 PM AST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.0°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High plus 1 except minus 2 inland.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1 except minus 2 inland. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the evening except rain along parts of the coast. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 21 January 2023
